name: Lord Vader (V)
Lore: 'Forgiving administrator of Imperial policy. Emperor Palpatine''s most trusted leader. Believes converting Skywalker is key to the Alliance''s downfall.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  May deploy an opponent''s lightsaber just lost from same site on him (for free); may then use two weapons.  While The Quick And Easy Path on table, Jedi Escape and What Was It? may not cancel duels.  Immune to attrition < 5.(Original concept by Jerry Jensen - PC Volunteer Award 2005)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
